sentence: 3190) to amend the Burma Unified through Rigorous  Military Accountability Act of 2022 to extend the sunset, to require a  determination with respect to the imposition of sanctions on certain  persons of Burma, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Bringing Real Accountability Via Enforcement in Burma Act

sentence: 3854) to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit a  plan to expand the use of certain automation tools in the Department of  Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Modernizing All Veterans and Survivors Claims Processing Act

sentence: 3579) to amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain  improvements to the Veterans Readiness and Employment program of  Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Veterans Readiness and Employment Program Integrity Act

sentence: 2808) to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prevent consumer  reporting agencies from furnishing consumer reports under certain  circumstances, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Homebuyers Privacy Protection Act

sentence: 3490) to require the Government Accountability Office to produce  a report on esophageal cancer, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Gerald E. Connolly Esophageal Cancer Awareness Act of 2025

sentence: 3423) to amend title 49, United States Code, to include  aircraft deicing storage facilities in the definition of airport  development, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Facility for Runway Operations and Safe Transportation Act

sentence: 2591) to require the Administrator of the Federal Aviation  Administration to revise regulations for certain individuals carrying  out aviation activities who disclose a mental health diagnosis or  condition, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Mental Health in Aviation Act of 2025

sentence: 6504) to extend duty-free treatment provided with  respect to imports from Haiti under the Caribbean Basin Economic  Recovery Act, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Haiti Economic Lift Program Extension Act

sentence: 1713) to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to include  the Secretary of Agriculture as a member of the Committee on Foreign  Investment in the United States, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Agricultural Risk Review Act of 2025

sentence: 2212) to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to  establish the Intelligence Rotational Assignment Program, and for other  purposes, as amended.
title: Dhs Intelligence Rotational Assignment Program and Law Enforcement Support Act

sentence: 2302) to take certain Federal land in the State of  California into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of  Miwok Indians, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians Land Transfer Act of 2025

sentence: 3343) to amend the Federal securities laws to  specify the periods for which financial statements are required to be  provided by an emerging growth company, and for other purposes, as  amended.
title: Greenlighting Growth Act

sentence: 4275) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard, to  establish the Secretary of the Coast Guard, and for other purposes, as  amended.
title: Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2025

sentence: 1917) to establish the Great Lakes Mass Marking Program, and  for other purposes, as amended.
title: Great Lakes Mass Marking Program Act of 2025

sentence: 2815) to provide equitable treatment for the people of the  Village Corporation established for the Native Village of Saxman,  Alaska, and for other purposes, as amended.
title: Cape Fox Land Entitlement Finalization Act of 2025
